Instructions

  1. Welcome to Process Scheduler.
  2. Fill each of the input fields
  3. After submitting the form by filling all the input fields, the inputs would be shown to the below table.
  4. Choose different Algorithms by clicking at different options shown in the navbar.
    5. ↓
  5. The resultant values would be shown as follows:

    6. *if you choose SJF(Preemptive) Sched.

  6. If want summary then click on the Summary button just below the input table.

    7. it would look somewhat like the above illustration.

  7. If want summary results in sorted order w.r.t. the Avg Turnaround time then click the sort button after clicking the summary button:

    8. Bonus: A visual representaion of Avg turnaround time using bar-graph

    Got it
